DataElement.preferredName: Immunology Immunization Personal Medical History Assessment Description Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The study of the body's immune system._A technique used to cause an immune response that results in resistance to a specific disease, especially an infectious disease._an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._The words of something written.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The study of the body's immune system._A technique used to cause an immune response that results in resistance to a specific disease, especially an infectious disease._an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The study of the body's immune system.

Concepts.definition: The study of the immune system and its reaction to pathogens, as well as its malfunctions (autoimmune diseases, allergies, rejection of organ transplants).

Property.preferredDefinition: A technique used to cause an immune response that results in resistance to a specific disease, especially an infectious disease.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: Inoculating an individual with either killed or live agents to prevent contraction of a disease.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
